udaan - Regional Collections (North)

Location - Bengaluru, Karnataka, India, Work Type: Full Time

Other June 08, 2022

udaan is a B2B ecommerce platform that brings traders, wholesalers, distributors, retailers, and manufacturers in India on to a single platform. Our goal is to make ‘doing business’ easy in India & make B2B commerce convenient and efficient

udaan Capital is the NBFC arm of udaan & offers credit services to buyers and sellers on and off udaan’s B2B ecommerce platform to grow their business further. This space is largely untapped with less than 10% of MSMEs having access to working capital loans from financial institutions. In this way, udaan is uniquely positioned to formalize &scale trade credit.

Learn more about us: https://udaan.com/

Department Hierarchy

Field Collections

Experience range

10 years - 15 years

Role Description

Function: Credit

Sub Function: Collections

Location: Kolkata

Reports to: Zonal Manager-Deepak Khanna

Team Composition: team handling-2 Sr Managers(under them CCM team of 11-12 members)

Job Responsibilities

  • Strategizing and driving collections across the zone.
  • Managing 60+ days past due and above.
  • Developing and implementing segmented collection strategies and processes depending on bucket/ area/ product/ customer behaviour etc.
  • Building and managing an engaged collections team that takes pride in their work.
  • Contributing to overall business strategy and annual budget process.
  • Recruiting, coaching, and mentoring the team; identifying team goals.

KRAs & KPIs of the role

  • Collection targets achieved across due months for the cluster for the cluster
  • Improve the collection cost metric, i.e., cost incurred for every rupee collected.
  • Timely completion of operational activities across the zone.
  • High customer satisfaction in terms of service.
  • Compliance on code of conduct/li>
  • Adequate manpower presence on field - hiring against open positions.
  • Training, coaching and performance incentivization of the entire team.

Functional Competencies

  • Results Orientation: Deliver on daily numbers, short-term goals and long-term milestones set by business. Consistently deliver impact commensurate to the role.
  • Business Acumen: Analyse the effectiveness of the processes on a day-to-day basis and course correct. Has deep sense of ground reality and leverages it to achieve results.
  • Data Driven/ Analytical: Drive specific process efficiency metrics and be accountable to drive data-driven decision making.
  • Team Management: Recruit, mentor and motivate the team to achieve targets on regular basis. Drive the team and deliver outcomes for self and team.
  • Stakeholder Management"Manage disagreements maturely and align stakeholders. Communicate proactively and help bring clarity around deliverables and owners

Candidate Profile

  • Must have at least 10 years' experience in setting up operations from scratch and scaling them. Experience must include entrepreneurial and/or credit collections stints.
  • Must have thorough understanding of hard bucket collections.
  • Must have experience in managing large teams of at least 250 + members including the field team.
  • Preferably having experience in BFSI or Fintech Industries.
  • Having commercial vehicle experience will be an added advantage.
  • Must have full time MBA education background.
Apply
